## MatchHelpers.all() method

Creates a condition that is true when all of the conditions passed as arguments are true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
all(...conditions: Condition<HookName>[]): Condition<HookName>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conditions | [Condition](./core.condition.md)<!-- -->&lt;HookName&gt;\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

[Condition](./core.condition.md)<!-- -->&lt;HookName&gt;
